name: The Grand Hunt 2025

location.name: The Grand Order of Divine Sweets

description:
The epic Easter treasure hunt known for its $1000 cash-filled Grand Prize Chocolate Smash Egg is back! 

Starting at 10:00 am, ten miniature treasure chests, each holding a unique scroll revealing a special prize will be hidden throughout the city. All interested seekers, ages 18 and older are encouraged to follow and watch @thegoodsweetsto Instagram and Facebook stories leading up to and all day for clues to where the treasure chests are hidden. The stakes have increased this year with an additional $500 cash prize filled Smash Egg. Let's get hunting, Torontoâ€¦it's going to be Grand!

organizer.name: The Grand Order of Divine Sweets
